verses.verse: וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Now when Jacob כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> that there was שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7668><s%> corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob לְבָנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> unto his sons לָ֖מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּתְרָאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> Why do ye look

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> Behold I have heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> that there is שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7668><s%> corn בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt רְדוּ־ <S%H3381><s%> get you down שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> there וְשִׁבְרוּ־ <S%H7666><s%> thither and buy לָ֣נוּ מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> place וְנִחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> for us from thence that we may live וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not נָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and not die

וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> went down אֲחֵֽי־ <S%H251><s%> brethren יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph's עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> ten לִשְׁבֹּ֥ר <S%H7666><s%> to buy בָּ֖ר <S%H1250><s%> corn מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְיָמִין֙ <S%H1144><s%> But Benjamin אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> brother יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph's לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> not with his brethren כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> for he said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Lest peradventure יִקְרָאֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7122><s%> befall him אָסֽוֹן׃ <S%H611><s%> mischief

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִשְׁבֹּ֖ר <S%H7666><s%> to buy בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [corn] among הַבָּאִ֑ים <S%H935><s%> those that came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> for the famine בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> was in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וְיוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַשַּׁלִּ֣יט <S%H7989><s%> [was] the governor עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> over the land ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַמַּשְׁבִּ֖יר <S%H7666><s%> [and] he [it was] that sold לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> to all the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came אֲחֵ֣י <S%H251><s%> brethren יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph's וַיִּשְׁתַּֽחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed down ל֥וֹ אַפַּ֖יִם <S%H639><s%> themselves before him [with] their faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the earth

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וַיַּכִּרֵ֑ם <S%H5234><s%> and he knew וַיִּתְנַכֵּ֨ר <S%H5234><s%> them but made himself strange אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> unto them and spake אִתָּ֣ם <S%H854><s%> to them קָשׁ֗וֹת <S%H7186><s%> roughly וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto them and he said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> unto them Whence בָּאתֶ֔ם <S%H935><s%> come וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> ye? And they said מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> From the land כְּנַ֖עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan לִשְׁבָּר־ <S%H7666><s%> to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> food

וַיַּכֵּ֥ר <S%H5234><s%> knew יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִכִּרֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H5234><s%> but they knew

וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר <S%H2142><s%> remembered יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלֹמ֔וֹת <S%H2472><s%> the dreams אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָלַ֖ם <S%H2492><s%> which he dreamed לָהֶ֑ם וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> of them and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to מְרַגְּלִ֣ים <S%H7270><s%> unto them Ye [are] spies אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you לִרְא֛וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land בָּאתֶֽם׃ <S%H935><s%> ye are come

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No אֲדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> unto him Nay my lord וַעֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <S%H5650><s%> are thy servants בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> come לִשְׁבָּר־ <S%H7666><s%> but to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <S%H400><s%> food

כֻּלָּ֕נוּ <S%H3605><s%> are all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> sons אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man's אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> [are] all one נָ֑חְנוּ <S%H5168><s%> We כֵּנִ֣ים <S%H3651><s%> we [are] true אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> [men] thy servants מְרַגְּלִֽים׃ <S%H7270><s%> are no spies

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> at עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land בָּאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> ye are come לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> unto them Nay but to see

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said שְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂר֩ <S%H6240><s%> ten עֲבָדֶ֨יךָ <S%H5650><s%> Thy servants אַחִ֧ים ׀ <S%H251><s%> brethren אֲנַ֛חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> of one בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַקָּטֹ֤ן <S%H6996><s%> and behold the youngest אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> is with אָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1><s%> with our father הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [is] this day וְהָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and one אֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> is no

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to them דִּבַּ֧רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> unto them That [is it] that I spake אֲלֵכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saying מְרַגְּלִ֥ים <S%H7270><s%> Ye [are] spies אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> you

בְּזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> Hereby תִּבָּחֵ֑נוּ <S%H974><s%> ye shall be proved חֵ֤י <S%H2416><s%> By the life פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall not תֵּצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> ye shall not go forth מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בְּב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> come אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> hence except your youngest הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> here

שִׁלְח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> Send מִכֶּ֣ם <S%H4480><s%> at אֶחָד֮ <S%H259><s%> one וְיִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> of you and let him fetch אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיכֶם֒ <S%H251><s%> your brother וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you הֵאָ֣סְר֔וּ <S%H631><s%> and ye shall be kept in prison וְיִבָּֽחֲנוּ֙ <S%H974><s%> may be proved דִּבְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1697><s%> that your words הַֽאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> whether [there be any] truth אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> in וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> you or else חֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> by the life פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> surely מְרַגְּלִ֖ים <S%H7270><s%> surely ye [are] spies אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> he
וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> And he put them all together אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מִשְׁמָ֖ר <S%H4929><s%> into ward שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֤ם <S%H413><s%> about יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> And Joseph בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> unto them the third זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> This do וִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> and live אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יָרֵֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> fear

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if כֵּנִ֣ים <S%H3651><s%> If ye [be] true אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> of your brethren אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> [men] let one יֵאָסֵ֖ר <S%H631><s%> be bound בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house מִשְׁמַרְכֶ֑ם <S%H4929><s%> of your prison וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> go הָבִ֔יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ye carry שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7668><s%> corn רַעֲב֥וֹן <S%H7459><s%> for the famine בָּתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1004><s%> of your houses

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיכֶ֤ם <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> your youngest תָּבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> But bring אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וְיֵאָמְנ֥וּ <S%H539><s%> be verified דִבְרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1697><s%> unto me so shall your words וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and you will not תָמ֑וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> and ye shall not die וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> And they did כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> to another אֲבָל֮ <S%H61><s%> We [are] verily אֲשֵׁמִ֣ים ׀ <S%H818><s%> guilty אֲנַחְנוּ֮ <S%H587><s%> we עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning אָחִינוּ֒ <S%H251><s%> concerning our brother אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> in that רָאִ֜ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> we saw צָרַ֥ת <S%H6869><s%> the anguish נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <S%H5315><s%> of his soul בְּהִתְחַֽנְנ֥וֹ <S%H2603><s%> when he besought אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמָ֑עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> us and we would not hear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> come אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about הַצָּרָ֖ה <S%H6869><s%> therefore is this distress הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיַּעַן֩ <S%H6030><s%> answered רְאוּבֵ֨ן <S%H7205><s%> And Reuben אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> them saying הֲלוֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not אָמַ֨רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Spake I אֲלֵיכֶ֧ם ׀ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֛ר <S%H559><s%> not unto you saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּחֶטְא֥וּ <S%H2398><s%> Do not sin בַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> against the child וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> and ye would not hear וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> for דָּמ֖וֹ <S%H1818><s%> ? therefore behold also his blood הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נִדְרָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> is required

וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> And they knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> understood יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> not that Joseph כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> by הַמֵּלִ֖יץ <S%H3887><s%> [them] for he spake unto them by an interpreter בֵּינֹתָֽם׃ <S%H996><s%> between

וַיִּסֹּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> And he turned himself about מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and וַיֵּ֑בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> from them and wept וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and returned to them again אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and communed אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> with them and took מֵֽאִתָּם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> from them Simeon וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ר <S%H631><s%> and bound אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> him before their eyes

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded יוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> Then Joseph וַיְמַלְא֣וּ <S%H4390><s%> to fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵיהֶם֮ <S%H3627><s%> their sacks בָּר֒ <S%H1250><s%> with corn וּלְהָשִׁ֤יב <S%H7725><s%> and to restore כַּסְפֵּיהֶם֙ <S%H3701><s%> money אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in שַׂקּ֔וֹ <S%H8242><s%> into his sack וְלָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> and to give לָהֶ֛ם צֵדָ֖ה <S%H6720><s%> them provision לַדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> for the way וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did he לָהֶ֖ם כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> and thus

וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> And they laded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁבְרָ֖ם <S%H7668><s%> with the corn עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חֲמֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H2543><s%> their asses וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and departed מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּפְתַּ֨ח <S%H6605><s%> of them opened הָאֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> And as one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׂקּ֗וֹ <S%H8242><s%> his sack לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give מִסְפּ֛וֹא <S%H4554><s%> provender לַחֲמֹר֖וֹ <S%H2543><s%> his ass בַּמָּל֑וֹן <S%H4411><s%> in the inn וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> he espied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּסְפּ֔וֹ <S%H3701><s%> his money וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> mouth אַמְתַּחְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H572><s%> for behold it [was] in his sack's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren הוּשַׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> is restored כַּסְפִּ֔י <S%H3701><s%> My money וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> is even הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and lo בְאַמְתַּחְתִּ֑י <S%H572><s%> [it is] even in my sack וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> failed לִבָּ֗ם <S%H3820><s%> and their heart וַיֶּֽחֶרְד֞וּ <S%H2729><s%> [them] and they were afraid אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> to another לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> What [is] this [that] God לָֽנוּ׃

וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> their father אַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> unto the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and told ל֔וֹ אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַקֹּרֹ֥ת <S%H7136><s%> him all that befell אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> unto them saying

דִּ֠בֶּר <S%H1696><s%> spake הָאִ֨ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another אֲדֹנֵ֥י <S%H113><s%> [who is] the lord הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land אִתָּ֖נוּ <S%H854><s%> for קָשׁ֑וֹת <S%H7186><s%> roughly וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> to us and took אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> כִּֽמְרַגְּלִ֖ים <S%H7270><s%> us for spies אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the country

וַנֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And we said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> unto כֵּנִ֣ים <S%H3651><s%> unto him We [are] true אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הָיִ֖ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> are not מְרַגְּלִֽים׃ <S%H7270><s%> [men] we are no spies

שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲנַ֛חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we אַחִ֖ים <S%H251><s%> brethren בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אָבִ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our father הָאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> one אֵינֶ֔נּוּ <S%H369><s%> is no וְהַקָּטֹ֥ן <S%H6996><s%> [is] not and the youngest הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [is] this day אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> is with אָבִ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> with our father בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלֵ֗ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And the man אֲדֹנֵ֣י <S%H113><s%> the lord הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the country בְּזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> I אֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> unto us Hereby shall I know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that כֵנִ֖ים <S%H3651><s%> that ye [are] true אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> you אֲחִיכֶ֤ם <S%H251><s%> of your brethren הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one הַנִּ֣יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> [men] leave אִתִּ֔י <S%H854><s%> for וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַעֲב֥וֹן <S%H7459><s%> [food for] the famine בָּתֵּיכֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> of your households קְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> [here] with me and take וָלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> and go

וְ֠הָבִיאוּ <S%H935><s%> And bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> brother הַקָּטֹן֮ <S%H6996><s%> your youngest אֵלַי֒ <S%H413><s%> to me וְאֵֽדְעָ֗ה <S%H3045><s%> unto me then shall I know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> you are not מְרַגְּלִים֙ <S%H7270><s%> that ye [are] no spies אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כֵנִ֖ים <S%H3651><s%> but [that] ye [are] true אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> you אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> you your brother אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> [men so] will I deliver לָכֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land תִּסְחָֽרוּ׃ <S%H5503><s%> and ye shall traffick

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came הֵ֚ם <S%H1992><s%> as they מְרִיקִ֣ים <S%H7324><s%> And it came to pass as they emptied שַׂקֵּיהֶ֔ם <S%H8242><s%> their sacks וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that behold every man's צְרוֹר־ <S%H6872><s%> bundle כַּסְפּ֖וֹ <S%H3701><s%> of money בְּשַׂקּ֑וֹ <S%H8242><s%> [was] in his sack וַיִּרְא֞וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צְרֹר֧וֹת <S%H6872><s%> the bundles כַּסְפֵּיהֶ֛ם <S%H3701><s%> of money הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they וַאֲבִיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> and when [both] they and their father וַיִּירָֽאוּ׃ <S%H3372><s%> they were afraid

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> their father אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> שִׁכַּלְתֶּ֑ם <S%H7921><s%> unto them Me have ye bereaved יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> [of my children] Joseph אֵינֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H369><s%> is no וְשִׁמְע֣וֹן <S%H8095><s%> [is] not and Simeon אֵינֶ֔נּוּ <S%H369><s%> more וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְיָמִ֣ן <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin תִּקָּ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> [is] not and ye will take עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> are against הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כֻלָּֽנָה׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> And Reuben אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> my two בָנַי֙ <S%H1121><s%> sons תָּמִ֔ית <S%H4191><s%> Slay אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אֲבִיאֶ֖נּוּ <S%H935><s%> if I bring אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you תְּנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> him not to thee deliver אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> him into my hand וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> and I אֲשִׁיבֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> and I will bring him to thee again אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֵרֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> shall not go down בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> My son עִמָּכֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> with כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָחִ֨יו <S%H251><s%> with you for his brother מֵ֜ת <S%H4191><s%> is dead וְה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he לְבַדּ֣וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone נִשְׁאָ֗ר <S%H7604><s%> and he is left וּקְרָאָ֤הוּ <S%H7122><s%> befall אָסוֹן֙ <S%H611><s%> alone if mischief בַּדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> him by the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תֵּֽלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> are taking בָ֔הּ וְהוֹרַדְתֶּ֧ם <S%H3381><s%> then shall ye bring down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׂיבָתִ֛י <S%H7872><s%> my gray hairs בְּיָג֖וֹן <S%H3015><s%> with sorrow שְׁאֽוֹלָה׃ <S%H7585><s%> to the grave
